Fantastic game, especially if you're looking for a change of pace from blowing the heads off of the undead.  Play portal 1 first to get the narrative, then dive into this baby.  It's a classic.

whats that you say? You say Valve could never have topped portal - You sir (or ma'am) are mistaken. This next chapter brings many new and exciting elements to portal gameplay that make it a very worthy game purchase submision position decision

A worthy successor to the original Portal, with interesting puzzles and new tools to use them in. Well-scripted storyline makes this game hard to put down. A challenging co-op is a definte bonus.
Best writing in a game I've ever experienced. fun challenging puzzles and a wonderful coop mode to play with your friend that valve did not need to add in the least bit. all for a great price.
better than the first. a lot longer too.
un grande gioco d'intelligenza divertente

Отличная игрушка - увлекательный сюжет превосходно сочетается с интересными головоломками + хороший кооператив.. Конечно тем, кто вообще не играл в игры серии Portal, советую начать знакомство с этим шедевром после прохождения первой части.

Great gameplay and AV, script but still far too short, most of the acheivements are based on how far you are in the game and not actually what the player has acheived. They finally added extra content and it turns out that the extra test chambers are just bits of the story that valve modified to be tests, very disapointing >_<.
NO CAKE! 
AT ALL!

Total:6/10

Portal 2 est juste époustouflant !

+ Le scénario 
+ L'univer futuriste & décalé
+ La bande son ( VF des personnages )
+ Le moteur graphique source engine ( simplicité des textures )
+ Le Système de défis 
+ La Campagne solo
+ Le mode Coop multijoueur
+ DLC gratuit
+ Les personnage atypique

- Chargement trop répétitif
- Durée de vie de la campagne solo

ENG:

Definitely one of the best games ever, the top story and a great game you play with a friend, if you like one of the original Portal game, you like this too, twice as much more of everything and a lot more done. Testimonial!

FIN:

Ehdottomasti yksi maailman parhaista peleistä ikinä, huippu tarina ja loistava peli kaverinkanssa pelattaessa, jos pidät alkuperäisestä portal 1 pelistä, pidät tästäkin, tuplasti enemmän kaikkea ja paljon paremmin tehtyän. Suositteluni!
combustible lemon.

Absolutely worthy of being the sequel to the incredibly brilliant Portal. Portal 2 is like kubrick meets pixar but still with an identity all its own. The new gel mechanics are fantastic. This is the best game to come outthis year. Everybody needs to play it.
Great fun game wit a lil bit of logic ;-)
Este jogo é muito bom
Excellent puzzle game with an intruiging storyline and challenging co-op.
Awesome! Clever! Buy it, play it! 'nuff said.
Отличная игра развивающая логику! КТО НЕ играл тому советую!!!!!!!!!!!!!

How dare you even ask this?
If you have not got the game by now I'm going to assume you're a retard with no taste in games. Go buy it now
Fabuloso, como el primero pero mucho mucho mejor y mas largo

Vous aimez les armées d'hommes-mantes ? Les blagues à deux balles, l'humour noir, les énigmes et les IA psychopathes ?
Ce jeu est pour vous !
Les énigmes ne sont pas forcément corsée, certaines vous demanderont du temps, voire de l'aide exterieure... Mais elles ne sont jamais frustrantes.

On ne peu pas en dire autant des maps réalisées par la communauté, le niveau de difficulté de certaines est franchement absurde... 
Et en l'absence d'un but, donné par le trés bon scénario de la partie solo,  je n'ai pas eu envie de me casser la tete sur des énigmes réalisés par des psychopathes.

Portal 2 c'est le bien.
Ew.  Now there's GEL?  Better get them bots in here to clean it up.

This is awesome.  My dorky nerdish side didn't think Portal could get better, and this one had me in stitches the whole time, I loved it, the puzzles are great, the plotline is awesome.  Potato batteries for the win!  Hahahaha.  Just the intro itself, has you going "WTF?  OMFG!" and laughing.  Definitely worth the money!  I haven't played multiplayer yet, I want to though.
Einfach  mega

One of the best games i have ever played. Every aspect of the original is perfected in the sequel. It's longer, Harder, and GLaDOS is funnier than ever with one liners that i still get cracked up by. I would consider this game worth  it it it were $200.

The excellent puzzles from the first game except more!
The excellent plot from the first game except more!
The excellent dialogue from the first game except more!
Around halfway through the game, you are placed in an area which such an amazing atmosphere that I've never experienced in any other game before. The scenery is just amazing.

Now with a Co-Op campaign featuring it's own story!

AND THERE ARE HATS.

10/10.
If you're going to buy it, wait until it's on sale. You'll only play the single player campaign once, along with the multiplayer only once.
Awesome, Just Awesome !

I was afraid that the lack of novelty would set Portal 2's bar lower than the first. This, thankfully, is not the case. Other than the conspicuous lack of challenge modes (which may be fixed by incoming free DLC), Portal 2's story is more interesting, its engine is more polished, its puzzles are engaging and its difficulty curve is more carefully tuned than a piano in an orchestra. Its new mechanics are interesting and really add spice to what could have otherwise become a samey experience, and the addition of other characters later in the campaign is frankly inspired.

That said, once you're done with it, (and have gone back and seen the dev commentary), there's really not much else to do.

OH SHIT！好玩到爆炸阿！

原來橘色+藍色的圈圈
配上一片白色的牆壁，可以組合出這麼多好玩的關卡
Hoy Las he pasado putas en una cámara de pruebas tan guapa que me he visto obligado a recomendar mi primer juego. ;)

Sehr gelungenes Spiel, weit weg vom tristen Standard der FP-Spiele. Mit NVidia 3D schaut das Game unglaublich gut aus, leider musste ich nach etwa einer Stunde kotzen wegen Seekrankheit ( durch eine Grippe mit verursacht) ;-)
Portal 2 probably had the best story and gameplay I have ever seen in any kind of media.
Awesome
The presentation and gameplay are up to Valve's usual superb quality while the addition of some dry British humor in the story make it a fun and hilarious ride!

Des salles de test encore plus sadiques et vicieuses que dans le premier t  une histoire qui ne sonne pas creux pour une suite , Portal 2 est une réussite ! Mais ....  c'est sensé être un jeu à part entière et non pas un mod comme le premier et pourtant : la durée de vie est la même (je ne prends pas en compte la co op)
This game is even more fun when coop-ing with cute girl LMAO

Molte recensioni dicono che il primo Portal non è altro che una Tech Demo rispetto a questo secondo titolo. Non sono molto distanti dalla realtà.
Gli elementi in gioco in questo seguito sono molti di più, e gli enigmi passano dal calcolo dei salti in modo preciso allo sfruttare gli elementi che abbiamo attorno, e la soluzione risulta solitamente molto più semplice di quello che ci saremmo immaginati in un primo momento. L'attenzione e la pazienza quindi giocano un ruolo predominante in questo seguito, che oltretutto "approfondisce" il background del gioco, ed introduce un terzo elemento alquanto particolare...

Pretty cool game, opens up the back story to Apeture Science and is muuuch longer then Portal, 2.5 times the puzzles.  New puzzle elements and some really cool old tech from the old Apeture.

Haven't played Co-Op yet.

All new mind bending options and tools! The single player is far longer than the first, and you will spend much more time on the increasingly difficult levels. Hilarious robotic dialogue that outdoes the original by far, and multiplayer co-op that is in itself worth the money you will spend on this game. It's a must-have!!

Wel, wi would begin to the coop of 2 players is great, you really depend on your friend! High Five infront of the camera makes the evil biatch very pissed, 

Its very epic in each room you go play with your friend!


Kind regards,

Alcholicman.A.K.A.Jimmy
Must-have, must-play.  There is nothing else like it.
An exponentially enjoyable experience--well worthy of the series and spot on for content and character development.  I think I may have a bro-crush on Cave Johnson.
Has Potatoes  11/10
Yes, of course it's good.  The dialogue is the best part.  Gameplay is very familiar.  Puzzles are far more "scripted" than the original, which i see as the only flaw.

A game everyone should play, because it will beat you up and drive you crazy and you will always come back for more...
SOunds like a pretty epic relationship... but never the less the satisfaction is... Unimaginable
Something Different.
Maravilloso Juego, Recomiendo a todo el mundo

This game is amazing, I can't think of any other way to describe it.

Portal 1 was a great puzzle game that introduced some awesome gameplay mechanics, and Portal 2 has simply surpassed the original game in every way.

Portal 2 added several new mechanics such as the gels and hard light surfaces (among many other new items) that change the way you play the game. You might have been thinking with portals in the first game, but you'll have to think even more outside of the box for this game.

Portal 2 also introduced multiplayer and co-op gameplay (with two new characters). Cooperation in this gamemode certainly adds to the challenge, but it's a great deal of fun with friends!

Finally, Portal 2 really develops the story and characters. Playing through the story provides a wealth of backstory on Cave Johnson, GLaDOS, Wheatley, and others. This game is hands down one of my favorite single player experiences on the PC.

This game is a beautiful gaming experience; it is an amazing sci-fi puzzle game with a wonderfully written story. I think that any one can enjoy this game, whether or not they played the first game. The first game would help in terms of immediately understanding the characters and gameplay mechanics, but it is not necessary.
Simply amazing... Cave Johnson is one of, if not the best character in video game, i only wish he had more lines in the game.
pure awsome
If you haven't played Portal 1, give yourself a slap. If you haven't played Portal 2, give yourself a harder slap. One of the best games I've ever played.
Absolutamente demencial!!

The most unique game I've ever had the pleasure of playing. I've never laughed this hard while using my brain simultaneously. If you buy this game and don't enjoy it to death you probably have the intellectual capacity and sense of humor of a lemon. Amazing. Everything I want out of a gaming experience.

Very fun game, but if you don't have someone to play the coop missions with, you'll be done with it in less than 10 hours. I've played it for 5 hours, beat it, uninstalled it, and never looked at it again.
The only bad thing about this game is it could never be as good as the fist one... Pretty damn close though

This game is absolutely beautiful, hilarious, and well done. Kudos to the Valve team for this gorgeous follow-up to the original. Witty monologue/dialogue and challenging, engaging, enjoyable play all the way through.

Portal 2 didn't have quite the impact on me that the original Portal had, but this adds new mechanics. It may try a little too hard with the humor, but overall it's still a very high quality and fun game.
If you don't like this game, you have no soul. And you suck. And you should go die. So go ahead, and die. Just don't bother me. I'm playing Portal.
